name: Moon Slayer
author: Col
content: After becoming a boss in the game, I began hiding within the players whilst uncovering the secrets of the game world. In order to become the only king, I have decided to resort to every conceivable means to change this world. Guilds? Players? Bosses? They are all stepping stones to achieve my goal. I will be slaying everything “Illusory Moon” has brought upon the world.
